content: भोस् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} A vocative particle used in addressing persons, and translateable by ‘oh,’ ‘sir,’ ‘oh,’ ‘halloo,’ ‘ah;’ (it drops its final {%visarga%} before vowels and soft consonants); कः कोऽत्र भोः <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; अथि भो महर्षिपुत्र <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; it is sometimes repeated; भो भोः शंकरगृहाधिवासिनो जानपदाः <ls>Māl. 3</ls> भोस् is said to have, in addition, the senses of ‘sorrow’ and ‘interrogation’.
